title: The counterfeit court lady: or, An answer to, your humble servant madam. Discovering all her cunning knacks and feats, how wittily she doth bestow her cheats: by which she doth much admiration gain, and in a splendid garb her self maintain. To the tune of, Your humble servant Madam.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke.,
